title: A Boy At Heart
description: Third book of the nostalgic Sam Caruso Stories, A Boy At Heart is a story of love, friendship and imagination coming together to create lasting memories for Sam Caruso of his beloved Aunt. In this story, Sam has a birthday, and his favorite aunt rewards him with a wonderful present: tickets to the Los Angeles Civic Light Opera! Sam has a wonderful experience, followed by dinner at the historic Biltmore Hotel. Follow Sam and see his wonderful reactions to the music, glamor, and beauty of his experiences.
author: Ray M. Vento
